name: Hentai World: Animated Puzzle
description:
Hentai World: Animated Puzzle - is a combination puzzle that challenges a player to slide pieces along certain routes until the picture is complete. After that, you will be able to enjoy an animated and voiced picture. The game is designed to spend the night alone, playing with one hand (͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)Features:50 HD artworks, with animations and voiced
Relaxing and atmosphere music
Steam Achievements
Picture galleryFunction keys(Better not to use them):Keyboard N: Complete level
Keyboard B: Previous level
Keyboard M: Set mode 99 replacements
Arts by SuRu
